dict.string: Future enhancement: accept dictionary containing Shortcuts and repo URL, that specifies which shortcuts to install from the repo
Now that we have cloned or updated the repository, get an updated reference to it
Get a list of all the shortcuts in the repository
Fetch the latest commit hash for the repository
SC PLLR INFO is now up to date with the shortcuts we need to update. Now we must check if there are any to update and etermine how to proceed.
No more shortcuts to update. Ask the user what to do.
We ran ourself with nothing more to run. Exit because we are done.
Please review and install the opened shortcuts
